input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item name information.

Item name:
Traditions by Waverly 14979056X036CHR Strands 56-Inch by 36-Inch Tier and Valance Set, Charcoal

Item keywords:
67% Poly/33% Cotton/Unlined
Imported
Includes two Tier panels and one valance
Each Tier measures 26W x 36L; valance measures 52W x 14L
1.5Rod pockets accommodate up to a 1Rod
67percent poly/33percent Cotton, unlined
for the kitchen, breakfast room, or bathroom. 
Machine washable cold, tumble dry on low.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Add a fresh touch to your kitchen, breakfast room, or bathroom with the Traditions by Waverly Strands Tier and Valance Set. This imported, unlined curtain set includes two Tier panels and one valance, measuring 26W x 36L each for the Tiers and 52W x 14L for the valance. The 1.5Rod pockets accommodate up to a 1Rod for easy installation. Made from a blend of 67% poly and 33% cotton, these curtains are machine washable cold and tumble dry on low for easy care. With their charcoal color, they will add a timeless and elegant look to any room in your home.
input_text.Response B:
Traditions by Waverly 14979056X036CHR Strands 56-Inch by 36-Inch Tier and Valance Set, Charcoal is a stylish and chic addition to any home. The charcoal color is a classic shade that fits any decor style, from modern to traditional. This set includes two tier panels and one valance for a complete look that adds elegance and sophistication to any room. The soft fabric is made of a poly/cotton blend that is durable and easy to care for. The 67% poly/33% Cotton, unlined fabric is machine washable and easy to care for. This set is perfect for any kitchen, breakfast room, or bathroom. The rod pockets accommodate up to a 1-inch rod, making it easy to hang and adjust as needed. These panels are unlined, so the light can filter through the fabric creating a soft and inviting atmosphere. The valance is beautifully detailed with a scalloped edge for a finishing touch. This product is imported and comes with a 30-day satisfaction guarantee.
